ComicInfo.Summary:
Something even stranger is in the neighborhood when the restless spirits of some merciless Martians are stirred from their slumber to attack again! It's up to the REAL Ghostbusters to save New Jersey from this angry red threat. Well... if they must.
Note: The two retailer incentive variant covers are unrelated to the story but feature favorite heroes from the IDW stable.
ComicInfo.Tags: Ray Stantz,Martians,Egon Spengler,Orson Welles,Ghostbusters,Winston Zeddemore,Janine Melnitz,Peter Venkman,Slimer
